item.title: Intro to R, R Studio, and R-Ladies
item.description: Our first meetup is in less than 2 weeks! This meetup will be on Tuesday, October 1st at 6 pm at Elborn College, Western University (1201 Western Road) in Room 2510. Elborn is a bit of a maze - see map and directions below. Parking at Elborn is ðŸ’° free ðŸ’° after 4 pm. Weâ€™re very excited to have Dr.Â Cortney Hanna-Benson back to take us through some helpful introductory info!

item.title: Info about new Western grad student group: Computational Social Science
item.description: One of our R-Ladies members is co-piloting a new venture that some of you who are Western grad students may be interested in: a group for people interested in Computational Social Science. See more below! Note this is not an R-Ladies event, but may feature content that overlaps with many of our membersâ€™ interests. Calling all Western graduate students! If you are interested in Causal Inference/ Machine Learning/ Quantitative Methods and the social sciences - a group of graduate students at Western are organizing a new club focusing on Computational Social Science!
